entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
